resources.string:
We're going to play a game for your birthday.
 Basically this app has a series of scavenger hunt locations, each with a four digit code.
 When you find the code, type it into the text box below the prompt.

 Oh, and if you get stuck, each prompt has a couple hints.
 Don't be a bitch tho. I'll know how many you used. 
 Love you, have fun!

 PS: I know this app is uglier than sin. I tried tho :)
"I\'m a little bitch, I want a hint!"
